summary: This is a collection of Map Markers.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]  [b][1] Messages[/b][/size]
          
       [[u]2014-11-22[/u]] Version 1.02 uploaded ! Erased Unused FormId.
       [[u]2014-11-22[/u]] Version 1.01 uploaded ! Someone brought to my attention that there were still some dirty edits. Recleaned the mod.
       [[u]2014-11-21[/u]] [size=2]Version 1.00 uploaded !

[/size]
[size=4]  [b][2] Description[/b][/size]
[size=3]   [2.1] [u]Ardox's Collection[/u][/size]
[size=2]
          Skyrim can load barely more than 250 [i]ESP[/i] and [i]ESM[/i] at a time. However, only on this site, there's more than 36 000 mods for Skyrim
          and some need multiple [i]ESP[/i] files to load. Either, a modder decides to erase old mods or to merge mods in order to have new mods.

          So I have decided to merge together mods that are  [i]"related" [color=#999999](-ish)[/color][/i]. I'm using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url] and the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37981/?]merge script[/url] that I found on Nexus
          to create merged mod for myself and I thought that I could save the hassle to learn how to play with records to other players.
          Basically, I didn't alter the content of these mods : I just fuse esp together. That means that :

          1. They are the [u]very same mods[/u] that you can find here on the Nexus.
                 [color=#b6b6b6]I DO NOT alter the content (except for the cleaning I did with TES5Edit).[/color]
[color=#b6b6b6]                 [/color][color=#93c47d]Link towards the mods in section [2.1].
[/color][color=#9fc5e8]                 Version used for fusion in section [4].[/color]

          2. They can be use standalone.
                 [color=#b6b6b6]You won't need to download the original version to use this mod.[/color]


          I've decided to upload some of the merged mod I've done. The mods has been selected by these following criteria :

          1. They are [i](somewhat)[/i] popular.
                 [color=#b6b6b6]There's very little interest to a collection of unpopular/unknown/broken mods.[/color]

          2. They are [i](somewhat)[/i] related.
[color=#b6b6b6]                 So it's not like a weird trail mix of random mods.[/color]

          3. They haven't been updated since a long time.
                 [color=#b6b6b6]Popular +"Old / Mature" = Stable. That means that this mod merge stable mod that are unlikely to change.[/color]
[/size]

[size=3]   [2.1] [u]Map Markers Collection[/u][/size][size=2]

          [u][color=#ff7700]Original Content[/color][/u] ~ [color=#00ff00]GO TRACK/ENDORSE THESE MODS TOO[/color]
             [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9385/]Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers[/url] 
             [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15489/]The Cartographers Map Markers[/url] 
             [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30804/]Labeled Mines[/url] 
             [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8521/?]Unmarked Places - Dragon Mounds[/url] 
             [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8510/]Unmarked Places - Shrines[/url] 

          [u][color=#ff7700]Merged Content Files [i](Merged Order)[/i][/color][/u] 
             BarenziahQuestMarkers.esp
             Cartographers Map Markers.esp
             ShiverTwitch's Labeled Mines.esp
             Unmarked Places - Dragon Mounds.esp
             Unmarked Places - Dragon Mounds.esp
             Unmarked Places - Shrines.esp
             ARDX-Patch-Markers.esp [i][color=#999999](TES5Edit patch created for these mod)[/color][/i]

[size=3]   [2.3] [u]Requirements[/u][/size]

          [b][u]None[/u][/b] - Everything from the merged mod [u][color=#ff7700]are included[/color][/u] in this mod. You won't need the original mod.

[/size]
[size=4]  [3] Credit[/size]
[size=2]
          [u][color=#ff7700]Original Content[/color][/u] ~ [color=#00ff00]GO GIVE THESE MODDERS SOME GEEK LOVE TOO[/color]

[/size]
